tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VP (VBG Sitting) (PP (IN at) (NP (NN home))) (, ,) (ADVP (RB alone))) (, ,) (CC and) (VP (VBG feeling) (NP (NP (DT an) (JJ overwhelming) (NN sense)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN happiness)))))) (. .)))

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (SBAR (IN If) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP ask) (NP (NP (NNP HIM)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NN faith))))))) (NP (PRP he)) (VP (MD will) (VP (VB grant) (NP (PRP it)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NN grace))))) (. .)))
